caption.p:
ZSD promoted tissue autophagy in MSU-treated rats. ((a)–(c)) The levels of p-AMPK, AMPK, p-mTOR, mTOR, p62, Beclin-1, and LC3II/I in the rat ankle joint were detected by western blotting. β-Actin was used as an internal control. Results were presented as means ± SD. ### P < 0.001 compared with the control group;
∗
P < 0.05 and
∗∗∗
P < 0.001 compared with the MSU group. (d) The level of LC3 in the rat ankle joint was evaluated by the immunofluorescence assay. The scale bar = 50 μm. Arrows represented LC3-positive cells. AMPK: AMP-activated protein kinase; p-: phosphorylated; mTOR: mammalian target of rapamyclin.
